•	Identify opportunities and implement initiatives for the evolving needs of the corporation, such as maximizing debt capital to support growth, increasing subsidiary distributions to improve parent credit, clearing subsidiary defaults, and implementing structures to improving earnings
•	Lead special initiatives, such as detailed precedent comparisons of project and finance document terms, MAE definition use, negotiating strategies, and the creation of a ‘DFI Guide’ 
Transaction Execution
•	Lead and advise on the structuring, negotiation and execution of non-recourse credit facilities, including direct involvement in project deals representing 11 countries and more than $6 billion in greenfield PF capital raised.  Multiple ‘Deal of the Year’ accolades awarded
•	Opine on the bankability of project documents, including identifying and appropriately mitigating risk 
•	Support growth by coordinating with regional corporate, business development, and finance teams, along with evaluation of prospective finance strategies
•	Develop primary and back-up syndication strategies that are best suited to the objectives and circumstances of the project, the parent company, and taking into account market conditions
Relationship Management
•	Serve as the central point of contact for global commercial bank, investment bank and development finance institution relationships
